Header.Text:
====================================================================================================== ICD for IED BMRZ Please refer to IED technical documentation for complete information ====================================================================================================== Adjust correctly MX apertures: db in units of 0.001% referring to inst.value; zeroDb in units of 0.001*measured units; dbAng in units of 0,0036 degree.
Power MX transmitted in primary values*1000, i.e. kVA, kW, kVAr; RFLO distance - in kilometers. All measured MX transmitted in secondary values (amps, volts, ohms) unless otherwise specified in IED documentation.
All the settings collected in custom GGIO's with a "Set" prefix. Time settings typed "IngEx" all in milisecond, analogues - specified in IED documentation.
Control DO's with "status-only" model is not allowed to mode change.
For GOOSE use ONLY GSE_GGIO1 objects, linked in IED to virtual IOs.
Use "CET 850" software to system engineering and GOOSE publishing/subscribing. Use "Configurator-MT" software to IED configuration, to assign User_GAPC1 data and commands, to assign GOOSE virtual IOs.
For SettingGroups operate - set in IED "S717"=1. For CSWI operate - set in IED "Input OU"=1.
(C) Mechanotronika www.mtrele.ru Support (toll-free in RU): 8-800-250-63-60 ======================================================================================================
